Sure, we encourage users to script some of the simpler cards. See https://code.google.com/p/magarena/wiki/ImplementingCards You can find the current card scripts in Magarena/scripts folder

More complex cards have the "requires_card_code" in their script. This means they need Java code to implement their effect. See https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/browse/#hg%2Fsrc%2Fmagic%2Fcard for examples.

If the program doesn't start with a new card, it usually means there is some error reading the new card script. In that case, you can check the Magarena/crash.log file to get some hint on what is the problem.

For card script problems, we recommend posting to our forum at http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewforum.php?f=82&sid=a9a79c7a3ff97c17530cca3020302bcd There are a some discussion there about card scripting, for example http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=7206
